ValidationRule.description: HR Case record types should only be assigned to HR role(s)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( AND( ISBLANK( Owner:Queue.Id), Owner:User.Access_Group__c <> 'HR' ), AND( ISBLANK(Owner:User.Id), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName <> 'HR' ) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HR', NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(OwnerId) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: HR Cases can only be assigned to HR Personnel.
